Description:
We are looking for a highly motivated and talented Computer Engineer Intern to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a Computer Engineer Intern, you will have the opportunity to work on various projects and gain hands-on experience in the field of computer engineering. You will be responsible for assisting with the design, implementation, and testing of computer systems and software applications. This internship will provide you with valuable practical experience and the opportunity to learn from experienced professionals in the industry.Responsibilities:Assist in the design and development of computer systems and software applications.
Collaborate with team members to identify and resolve technical issues.
Conduct testing and debugging of computer systems and software applications.
Assist in the documentation of technical specifications and user manuals.
Participate in team meetings and brainstorming sessions to contribute ideas and suggestions.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in computer engineering.
Perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor.Skills
Skills:
Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering or a related field.
Strong knowledge of computer hardware and software systems.
Proficient in programming languages such as C++, Python, and Java.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Attention to detail and ability to multitask.
Flexible and adaptable to changing priorities and deadlines.

Knowledge of computer hardware and software systems.
Proficiency in programming languages such as C++, Python, and Java.
Problem-solving and analytical skills.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Attention to detail and ability to multitask.
